data.text:
Great service and room value for money 
Mr Gopi looked after me great guy and helpful with everything. I'm a recurring guest at Jannah Place.

Spacious room very comfortable with all the amenities needed included cooker, cupboards, coffee and tea facilities great views.

I always return back here as its great location for travelling and food
data.title: Great Hotel & Service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mudassarm

Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.

Sincerely,
Fadi Hazeem 
General Manager
owner_response.author: Fadi Hazeem

data.text:
We visited a couple of weeks ago and really enjoyed this hotel. We arrived the early hours and were checked in easily and by lovely staff. We had a double, which had a massive comfy bed, kitchen area and bathroom. All very clean and was serviced regularly during our 6 day stay.  
The location is amazing few mins walk from the marina and beach area.  There is loads of mini markets nearby and the metro is about 10 mins away. We used the metro our whole trip and travelled all over dubai.  We didn't use any hotel facilities so cannot comment. But the staff were lovely and helpful at all times and if you needed anything it wasn't a problem.  We were just looking for somewhere we could just use as a base, clean and central and we were very happy with our choice.
data.title: Loved it.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:

owner_response.author: Fadi Hazeem

data.text:
The hotel cannot be easy found even with a taxi, there is no sign. We arrived tired after a long flight, the guy at the reception was rude and with an attitude. We showed our reservation with booking.com where we booked a studio overlooking the city. We were told that the hotel was full and we were left with a room without a window. We said that we would not go to such a room, I generally have a panic attack in enclosed spaces. The guy at the reception answered that this is not a problem with the hotel and if we don’t take it, look for another hotel at your own expense and they won’t give any money back. We called Booking.com and asked for help since on their website there is a studio with a window on the city, but we were politely told that They can’t help and we have to decide with the hotel. We were deceived by both the hotel and booking!!! 
We had to book another hotel and pay 650 euros for that night (including two reservations). No one wants to return our money and restore justice, the owners have completely lost their conscience. I'm sure no one will take care of you if you stay there. Avoid this terrible hotel and the inhumane staff there!
data.title: Terrible upplevelse

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Iren

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Sincerely,
Fadi Hazeem 
General Manager
owner_response.author: Fadi Hazeem

data.text:
We really liked the hotel. Great location. 10-15 minutes walk to the sea. No need to wait for a transfer or use the metro. The hotel has very friendly staff. All requests were immediately fulfilled. Very clean. Constant change of bed linen and towels. We would like to thank Anil from the housekeeping department for the cleanliness and order in the room. 

We lived in a room without a balcony. At first we were upset, and then we appreciated the silence, because on the other hand it could be a bit noisy. The room is large with a mini kitchen and a minimal but sufficient set of necessary items. The hotel is located next to the red metro line, which allows easy access to most attractions. It's also very convenient in terms of access to Dubai (DXB) airport.

For breakfast you need to go to another hotel of the same chain. In our opinion, breakfast is complete and varied, and every day there is something new. It was delicious and there was enough of everything.

There are many shops nearby. We used almaya store which is on the way to DMCC metro. We liked the selection there the most. But there's also a Viva shop not far away: cheaper but less choice. There are also many local cafes/restaurants nearby to suit every taste and budget.

We would also like to express our gratitude to Anna, who works at the hotel and helps to choose excursions. Anna can find an approach to everyone. We went to Abu Dhabi with our guide Sergey and it was an amazing trip.

Of course, there are certain little things, but we are not so picky that they outweigh the huge advantages of the hotel. Yes, the hotel is not new, but it is quiet, calm and friendly people work there. We recommend this area and this hotel.
data.title: We do recommend the hotel. Very nice experience.

data.text:
Good review and I lived since january 2nd here and No complaints. Especially Gopi room service personal doing a very good job.

He helped us with everything from room cleaning to TV issues and everything.

Thank you so much Gopi and jannah team.
data.title: Excellent service
